headline: Is Linde Fairly Priced After Recent Share Price Pullback?
summary: If you are wondering whether Linde is quietly turning into a bargain or just an expensive safety play, you are not alone. This article is designed to unpack exactly that question. Despite its reputation as a steady industrial gas giant, Linde's share price has slipped recently: down 2.6% over the past week, 4.5% over the last month, and 3.5% year to date, even though it is still up 25.1% over 3 years and 71.7% over 5 years. Recent headlines have focused on Linde's ongoing build out of...

headline: CICC Initiates Linde (LIN) With Outperform as Earnings Hit New Highs
summary: Linde plc (NASDAQ:LIN) is included among the 15 Blue Chip Dividend Stocks to Build a Passive Income Porfolio. On December 3, CICC initiated coverage on Linde plc (NASDAQ:LIN) with an Outperform rating and a $510 price target. The company posted strong earnings for the third quarter of 2025, with revenues coming in at $8.6 billion, […]
